name: Bread(est) Grand Prix
description:
"Bread Grand Prix" is a bread-baking racing game where players compete against each other in races while controlling a car made of bread. The goal is to grow in "tastiness" based on three criteria and win the race based on a combination of race order and the degree of tastiness criteria achieved. 

To win the race, it is not enough to simply be the fastest to reach the finish line. You also need to adjust all elements of the race to optimize the three aspects of "tastiness" related to bread. Even if your rank is low, you can still aim for first place in overall performance if you can adjust the tastiness effectively. This is the big attraction and appeal of the game.

Don't miss the original story that also reveals the mystery behind the unnatural game title.

Video submissions are welcome and no permission or contact is required. In that case, it would be appreciated if you could include the URL of the game's download page.

Note: The game only supports Japanese.
